sn46.18:1.1: “Mendicants, whoever has missed out on the seven awakening factors has missed out on the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.
sn46.18:1.2: Whoever has undertaken the seven awakening factors has undertaken the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.
sn46.18:1.4: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
sn46.18:1.5: Whoever has missed out on these seven awakening factors has missed out on the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.
sn46.18:1.6: Whoever has undertaken these seven awakening factors has undertaken the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.”
